days.text: Temperature falling slightly. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. A few rain patches at first. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Mainly fine. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Dry. Mainly fine. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Dry. Mainly fine. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
